subject: [YouTrack, Commented] Issue codio-6421: Show current user limit in billing area
text:
Improvement was updated by AndreyNikitin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 08:29.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6421 >codio-6421< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6421 > Show current user limit in billing area Created by Joel Moss                                                                  
Show the current user limit inside the org billing area of the dashboard. We have had a few users asking what their limit is, or that it shows wrong. So when it shows the plan, name, show the user limit alongside it like we do when edu trial plan is used. 
      < https://github.com/codio/server/pull/694 >https://github.com/codio/server/pull/694

Improvement was updated by AndreyNikitin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 08:29.

codio-6421 Show current user limit in billing area Created by Joel Moss
Show the current user limit inside the org billing area of the dashboard. We have had a few users asking what their limit is, or that it shows wrong. So when it shows the plan, name, show the user limit alongside it like we do when edu trial plan is used.
